text: Hianagi sondia vahe'mo'za anage hu'naze, Kagra tagranena hatera ovugahane, tagrama hapinti'ma atreta frege, amu'nompinti'ma refko hu'za mago'a vahetima zamahesu'za, ana zankura zamagra ontahigahaze. Hagi kagrama vananke'za kahesu'za 10 tauseni'a vahe'ma zamahe'za musema nehazankna hugahaze. Hagi kagra atrenka kumate mani'nenka vaheku'ma upa hanuno, neone zanku upa'ma hanunkenka taza hananana knare hugahie.
